Multimedia.title: Borrowing Brilliance from Biology: The Future of Design
Multimedia.lessonRelevance: This overview shows what bioinspired design looks like to inspire student-driven projects & investigations. (Beta: not on YouTube)

Multimedia.title: Changing the world starts with defining a problem
Multimedia.lessonRelevance: Helps students reflect on how they interact with products and identify ways they could be improved. (Beta: not on YouTube)

Multimedia.title: Kickstart innovation with a mind map
Multimedia.lessonRelevance: Builds the transferable skill of ideating and summarizing by drawing mind maps. (Beta: not on YouTube)
